metadata.title: CVE-2024-26900 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:md: fix kmemleak of rdev->serialIf kobject_add() is fail in bind_rdev_to_array(), 'rdev->serial' will bealloc not be freed, and kmemleak occurs.unreferenced object 0xffff88815a350000 (size 49152):  comm "mdadm", pid 789, jiffies 4294716910  hex dump (first 32 bytes):    00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  ................    00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  ................  backtrace (crc f773277a):    [<0000000058b0a453>] kmemleak_alloc+0x61/0xe0    [<00000000366adf14>] __kmalloc_large_node+0x15e/0x270    [<000000002e82961b>] __kmalloc_node.cold+0x11/0x7f    [<00000000f206d60a>] kvmalloc_node+0x74/0x150    [<0000000034bf3363>] rdev_init_serial+0x67/0x170    [<0000000010e08fe9>] mddev_create_serial_pool+0x62/0x220    [<00000000c3837bf0>] bind_rdev_to_array+0x2af/0x630    [<0000000073c28560>] md_add_new_disk+0x400/0x9f0    [<00000000770e30ff>] md_ioctl+0x15bf/0x1c10    [<000000006cfab718>] blkdev_ioctl+0x191/0x3f0    [<0000000085086a11>] vfs_ioctl+0x22/0x60    [<0000000018b656fe>] __x64_sys_ioctl+0xba/0xe0    [<00000000e54e675e>] do_syscall_64+0x71/0x150    [<000000008b0ad622>] entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x6c/0x74

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
linux-hwe-6.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.5').
